name: FaceTube
description:
A clean, slightly wider Facebook skin based on the Youtube design.
  • Google Chrome only!
  • Screen resolution of 1920x1080 recommended
additional_info: My first skin is an attempt to make a Facebook skin that is nice and clean looking without changing too much of the layout or images. It's basically a whole lot of small tweaks to the original design that, in my opinion, make Facebook look better. Feedback in the comments below is appreciated! If there is a lot of interest I might make a version with the original width as well. Let me know in the comments below! -Jenne
